scripts.optimize:js: npm run optimize:js:en && npm run optimize:js:nl && npm run optimize:js:fr

scripts.config:production: cp src/assets/config/production.js dist/ && mv dist/production.js dist/config.js

scripts.elm:translate:nl: elm-i18n-generator --format PO --language NL --import src/translations/NL/App.po --importOutput src/translations && npm run copy:translation:nl
scripts.elm:translate:fr: elm-i18n-generator --format PO --language FR --import src/translations/FR/App.po --importOutput src/translations && npm run copy:translation:fr

scripts.build:development:nl: npm run elm:translate:nl && npm run elm:development:nl
scripts.build:development:fr: npm run elm:translate:fr && npm run elm:development:fr
scripts.build:staging: npm run build:staging:en && npm run build:staging:nl && npm run build:staging:fr && npm run sass:generate && npm run copy:development && npm run config:staging

scripts.build:staging:nl: npm run elm:translate:nl && npm run elm:development:nl
scripts.build:staging:fr: npm run elm:translate:fr && npm run elm:development:fr

scripts.build:production:nl: npm run elm:translate:nl && npm run elm:production:nl
